abstract: For consumers trying to figure out what the financial overhaul bill means for them, the legislation the Senate passed Thursday offers some tantalizing possibilities, Ron Lieber writes in The New York Times.
snippet: For consumers trying to figure out what the financial overhaul bill means for them, the legislation the Senate passed Thursday offers some tantalizing possibilities, Ron Lieber writes in The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: For consumers trying to figure out what the financial overhaul bill means for them, the legislation the Senate passed Thursday offers some tantalizing possibilities, Ron Lieber writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: How the Finance Bill Affects Consumers

abstract: MasterCard plans to open its platform so developers can use its payment technology in mobile and Web apps.
snippet: MasterCard plans to open its platform so developers can use its payment technology in mobile and Web apps.
lead_paragraph: There has been a lot of talk about digital forms of payment replacing cash and even credit cards. But MasterCard intends to stay in the middle of the technological innovation.

headline.main: MasterCard Wants Programmers to Use Its Payment Technology
